name: thinkspira
description: ThinkSpira - Educational Platform with Google Classroom Integration

scripts.start: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix backend" "npm start --prefix frontend"
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix backend" "npm start --prefix frontend"
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install --prefix backend && npm install --prefix frontend
scripts.production: NODE_ENV=production concurrently "npm start --prefix backend" "npm run build --prefix frontend && npx serve -s frontend/build -l 3000"
